last_episode_to_air.name: What Goes Around
last_episode_to_air.overview: Will makes a sacrifice to protect his family. Katie races to save refugees outside the walls. Snyder struggles to control a Colony amidst the chaos of war. Bram and Gracie make a big decision.

name: Colony
overview: In the near future a family must make difficult decisions as they balance staying together with trying to survive. They live in Los Angeles, which has been occupied by a force of outside intruders.  While some people have chosen to collaborate with the authorities and benefit from the new order, others have rebelled — and suffer the consequences.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Set in the near future, Colony centers on a family headed up by Holloway and Callies who must make difficult decisions as they balance staying together while trying to survive. They live in L.A., which has been occupied by a force of outside intruders. While some people have chosen to collaborate with the authorities and benefit from the new order, others have rebelled and suffer the consequences.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: The city of Los Angeles has been occupied by an unknown force. Former FBI agent Will Bowman and his wife Katie are separated from their son during the invasion, and are willing to do anything to be reunited with him. When they are offered a chance to get their son back by collaborating with the occupational government, Will and Katie find themselves faced with the toughest decision of their lives.

episodes.name: A Brave New World
episodes.overview: Will faces unforeseen challenges on his first day at his new job. Katie receives her first assignment. Maddie reconnects with an old acquaintance. Carlos pays the price for Will's collaboration.

episodes.name: 98 Seconds
episodes.overview: Katie's first mission forces her to question her commitment to the cause. Will's search for Geronimo doesn't sit well with the resistance. Bram's girlfriend shares a secret with him.

episodes.name: Blind Spot
episodes.overview: Will continues to earn the respect of his new colleagues, but when his home comes under an attack, everyone is a suspect- even those closest to him. Meanwhile, Maddie finds a way in to the upper echelon.

episodes.name: Geronimo
episodes.overview: Geronimo's identity is revealed. Will begins to question Katie's loyalties. Bram finds his way into a secret world. Snyder sees an opportunity to improve his standing.

episodes.name: Yoknapatawpha
episodes.overview: A resistance operation traps Will, Katie and Snyder in the Yonk and tests their allegiances.

episodes.name: Broussard
episodes.overview: Will hunts the resistance, bringing him closer to learning his wife's secret. Katie feels cut off from her family and her cell. Maddie is caught up in Green Zone intrigue.

episodes.name: In from the Cold
episodes.overview: A high-ranking Resistance member is ready to cut a deal. Katie receives a second chance. Bram proposes a risky journey outside the colony walls.

episodes.name: Zero Day
episodes.overview: Will wants his family out from under the occupation. Katie and Broussard plot a major operation. Snyder tries to protect his office. Maddie makes a bold political move.

episodes.name: Gateway
episodes.overview: The Resistance kidnaps a high-value target. The L.A. bloc is placed on lockdown.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Set in the near future, Colony centers on a family headed up by Holloway and Callies who must make difficult decisions as they balance staying together while trying to survive. They live in L.A., which has been occupied by a force of outside intruders. While some people have chosen to collaborate with the authorities and benefit from the new order, others have rebelled and suffer the consequences.

episodes.name: Eleven.Thirteen
episodes.overview: The second season opener has Will and Katie trying to keep their family together in the changing city.  Broussard returns home while Snyder receives a job offer from a mysterious organization.

episodes.name: Somewhere Out There
episodes.overview: Will decides to trust an old friend. Jennifer visits Katie while Bram meets the camp commandant.

episodes.name: Sublimation
episodes.overview: Will, Devon, and Charlie try to journey home. Katie, who fears the worst, says goodbye to her daughter. Bram makes friends at camp; and Maddie finds a new project.

episodes.name: Panopticon
episodes.overview: Jennifer keeps an eye on the Bowman house. The family encounters unexpected challenges when Charlie returns home.

episodes.name: Company Man
episodes.overview: Will returns to an unfamiliar workplace; Katie is on her best behavior; Broussard and his cell make a discovery about the Wall.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.overview: The Resistance reaches out to Katie; Will wants to help his wife bury her past; Maddie and Nolan visit the labor camp.

episodes.name: Free Radicals
episodes.overview: Bram embarks on a risky sabotage mission with his friends; Will faces the new Resistance; Kate learns a dark truth about the bloc.

episodes.name: Good Intentions
episodes.overview: Will and Katie must save a fugitive from the occupation; at the camp, Snyder hides evidence; Broussard's cell is threatened by one of their own.

episodes.name: Tamam Shud
episodes.overview: Will and Katie attempt to make contact with a new arrival in the bloc; Bob has some questions for the Bowman family.

episodes.name: The Garden of Beasts
episodes.overview: Will, Katie and Broussard search for a way out of the colony.  Maddie gets some visitors in the Green Zone.  Bram looks for closure.

episodes.name: Lost Boy
episodes.overview: Five different points of view show the attack on the Green Zone.

episodes.name: Seppuku
episodes.overview: Will, Katie, and Broussard battle the Red Hand for control of the RAP gauntlet; Snyder helps Helena regain control over the Los Angeles bloc.

episodes.name: Ronin
episodes.overview: In the second season finale, the Bowman family must make an impossible choice following a revelation about the fate of the colony.

episodes.name: Maquis
episodes.overview: Six months after escaping Los Angeles, the Bowmans and Snyder enjoy a simple life in the mountains-until a sudden arrival changes everything.

episodes.name: Puzzle Man
episodes.overview: Will and Katie put themselves at risk to make contact with the Resistance. Broussard pieces together IGA secrets left behind in LA.

episodes.name: Sierra Maestra
episodes.overview: Will assesses the Resistance Camp's safety. Katie tries to get more involved. Broussard and Amy encounter survivors outside the walls.

episodes.name: Hospitium
episodes.overview: Will and Katie fear they might be in danger when the Resistance camp is put in lockdown. A risky plan makes Broussard question Amy's intentions.

episodes.name: End of the Road
episodes.overview: Will, Katie, and Snyder struggle to protect their secrets while under interrogation.

episodes.name: The Emerald City
episodes.overview: The Bowman family encounters danger on the road to a possible new home. After getting a hero's welcome at IGA headquarters, Snyder settles into retirement.

episodes.name: A Clean, Well-Lighted Place
episodes.overview: Will follows clues that may expose a dangerous secret about the Seattle Colony. Katie helps a refugee family. Bram steps in as a parent to Gracie.

episodes.name: Lazarus
episodes.overview: Katie suspects there might be a dark side to her refugee case work. Will helps Broussard and Amy with a Resistance operation. Snyder goes back to work for the IGA. Bram starts a new job.

episodes.name: The Big Empty
episodes.overview: Will, Broussard, Amy, and Bram work together to kidnap a high-ranking IGA officer.

episodes.name: Sea Spray
episodes.overview: Will and Katie question whether their family is safe in Seattle. Snyder digs up dirt on Everett Kynes. Amy parts ways with Broussard.

episodes.name: Disposable Heroes
episodes.overview: Will, Broussard, Katie, and Amy help the Outliers deal with an emergency. Snyder makes his play to take over Seattle. Kynes runs damage control.

episodes.name: Bonzo
episodes.overview: Will and the Outliers fight to save Kynes from Snyder's IGA army.

episodes.name: What Goes Around
episodes.overview: Will makes a sacrifice to protect his family. Katie races to save refugees outside the walls. Snyder struggles to control a Colony amidst the chaos of war. Bram and Gracie make a big decision.
